participant_1.background:
Jasper may be jealous of my new Chevy.
i enjoy crosswords , crocheting , and football.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
my grandmother lives in my guesthouse.

participant_2.background:
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
i love cooking.
I am married to another viking descendant and we have many children.
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
i visit comic con.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Hello! It's going well. Just finished making a pot roast.
Oh, that sounds delicious. I love cooking. What's your favorite dish to make?
I like cooking anything with a lot of flavor. I also love making desserts.
I love making desserts too. What's your favorite kind of dessert to make?
My favorite is cheesecake. I love the creamy texture and the sweet flavor.
Cheesecake is so good. I love making it with fresh fruit.
I like making it with fresh fruit too. It's so delicious.
What are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to Comic-Con. Have you ever been?
I have been to Comic-Con. It's a lot of fun. I love seeing all the costumes and the people dressed up as their favorite characters.
I know, right? It's so much fun. I love seeing all the creativity.
I think I'm going to go to Comic-Con this weekend.
That's awesome! I hope you have a great time.
